vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 1 to the subrecipient agreement with Golden Gate Adult Rehabilitation Ministry, Inc. for additional recovery support services at the South Dallas Drug Court - Not to exceed $50,000.00, from $50,000.00 to $100,000.00 - Financing:  U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration Grant Funds
